author: Phil Vickery
method: Bring the water to simmering point in a saucepan. Add the vanilla pods and seeds, sugar, rum, limes and whole apricots. Stir until the sugar melts, and poach the apricots for 12 minutes. To serve, pour into a large warm bowl.
ingredients: 250ml/9fl oz water,  2 vanilla pods, split and seeds scraped out,  50g/2oz brown sugar,  1 tbsp rum,  2 limes, sliced in half,  5 ripe apricots
